overview: "Inbetweenness" alludes to the ambiguities of deterritorialization and of hybrid cultural identity. It navigates a destabilising state of diasporic existence by reimagining and experiencing childhood home through digital mapping tools. Searching for traces of the past within satellite imagery, aerial photography, and 360 photography, Kasra yearns for a sense of belonging to her homeland.
title: Inbetweenness
